entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: The group of students that Harry is leading in practicing disarming spells.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is teaching the others how to disarm their opponents with a wand.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: One of Harry's students who is struggling to disarm his opponent.

entities.name: expelliarmus
entities.description: The spell that the students are practicing to disarm their opponents.

entities.name: wands
entities.description: The objects used by the students to cast spells and disarm their opponents.

relationships.description: Harry is teaching Neville how to disarm his opponent with a wand.
Harry uses the Expelliarmus spell to disarm his opponents.
Neville loses control of his wand and it flies out of his hand.
Harry teaches the others how to use the Expelliarmus spell.
